archimate:Requirement.name: SC.1.2.2b: b) enhanced or specialised security clauses in contracts, new or improved security arrangements (e.g. to address particular information risks), with involvement from the information security function
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
